import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Form, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useCartActions } from '../../context/CartContext'; const CartComponent = ({ config, data }) => { const { items = [], total = 0, itemCount = 0, subtotal = 0 } = data; const { updateCartItem, removeCartItem } = useCartActions(); const formatCurrency = (amount) => { return `AED ${parseFloat(amount).toFixed(2)}`; }; const handleQuantityChange = async (itemId, newQuantity) => { if (newQuantity < 1) { await removeCartItem(itemId); } else { await updateCartItem(itemId, newQuantity); } }; const renderCartItem = (item) => (
{item.stock && item.stock <= 2 && ( {item.stock} LEFT )}
{item.name}
{/* Size Dropdown */}
{/* Quantity Controls */}
{item.quantity}
{/* Stock Warning */} {item.stock && item.stock <= 2 && (
Only {item.stock} left
)} {/* Price */}
{formatCurrency(item.salePrice || item.price)} {item.salePrice && item.salePrice < item.price && ( {formatCurrency(item.price)} )}
{/* Action Links */}
{formatCurrency((item.salePrice || item.price) * item.quantity)}
); return (
{/* Shopping Bag Section */}

Shopping Bag ({itemCount} items)

{/* Free Shipping Banner */}
Yay you got a free shipping!!
{/* Delivery Info */}
Delivery to Dubai by Mon, 21st Jul
{items.length > 0 ? ( items.map(renderCartItem) ) : (
Your cart is empty

Add some products to get started!

)}
{/* Order Summary Section */}
Order Summary
 {/* Shukran Loyalty Program */}
Your order could earn you 151 Shukrans, Exclusive Offers And More
S Shukran
{/* Coupon Section */}
Apply coupon/Voucher code
{/* Payment Options */}
Split into 4 Interest-Free Monthly Payments of AED 188.25
{/* Price Breakdown */}
Sub Total: {formatCurrency(subtotal)}
Shipping Fee: AED 12 Free
Grand Total: {formatCurrency(total)}
); }; export default CartComponent;
